scopecontent.p: The collection consists of two land grants for acreage in Nova Scotia. Both are on vellum with large wax seals. One grant concerns 100,000 acres on Saint John's River to Alex McNutt, Matthew Clarkson & associates, 1765 (Benjamin Franklin and Anthony Wayne were among the associates). The other concerns a grant to a tract of land in Annapolis Township to Matthew Clarkson, Benjamin Jacobs & associates, 1765.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
